channel.title: Few Problems
channel.description:
I just have 3 Problems I need to be fixed, but can't find a way to do it:
1)Christmas crackers only give you 1gp, how do i fix it? (in item.java it says: [code] public static int crackers[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048}; [/code]
2)How do i change the max amount of money/items?
[s]3), the magics hit the npc's just fine BUT...when you attack a person with them, they splash 90% of the time, is there a way i can fix it? [/s] Thanks for any of your help! :)
P.S. I'm Using a "Satan's Isle" source, if that helps at all

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

::pickup works just fine for me, it’s just the other things :P[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 12:16:38 PM[/size][hr][quote=“i ancients i, post:4, topic:117516”]for number 3, if ur using satans isle it always splashes because the mage def,bonuses actually work. and 2…go into shophandler.java or cfg…and u can edit there[/quote]

I Had max mage bonus, and the other person had full dharoks on, it still splashed all but once. and I dont see it in shophandler.java or shophandler.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

for the 1st one search

/*case 14: //Use something on another player

add this i think it should work!

/*case 14: //Use something on another player junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) junk2 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) junk3 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) int CrackerSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int CrackerID = playerItems[CrackerSlot]; CrackerID -= 1; //Only to fix the ID ! if (CrackerID == 962) { sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); int UsedOn = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 3, 1) / 1000); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerMsg = true; deleteItem(CrackerID, CrackerSlot, playerItemsN[CrackerSlot]); if (misc.random(2) == 1) { addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); sendMessage("And you get the crackers item."); } else { sendMessage("but you didn't get the crackers item."); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true; } } break;*/

item.title: Few Problems
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

First off, magic is fine, that’s good. Second off, you didn’t edit the correct int.

[code]public static int phats[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048};

public static int randomPhat()
{
	return phats[(int)(Math.random()*phats.length)];
}[/code]

public static int partyhats[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048}; public static int randomPartyHat() { return partyhats[(int)(Math.random()*partyhats.length)]; }

CORRECT THESE INTS.

Read full topic

@Wildcat_240 wrote:

I just have 3 Problems I need to be fixed, but can’t find a way to do it:

1)Christmas crackers only give you 1gp, how do i fix it? (in item.java it says: public static int crackers[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048};

3), the magics hit the npc’s just fine BUT…when you attack a person with them, they splash 90% of the time, is there a way i can fix it? Thanks for any of your help!
